languages.text: {n}Соломон бьет кулаком в грудь и покорно произносит:{/n} "Я прошу меня простить и не судить по моему поведению о других арбитрах".
{n}Solomorne thumps himself on the chest and humbly says:{/n} "I ask your forgiveness and request that you do not base your opinion of the Arbitrators on my conduct."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон бьет кулаком в грудь и покорно произносит:{/n} "Я прошу меня простить и не судить по моему поведению о других арбитрах".

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne thumps himself on the chest and says humbly:{/n} "I ask your forgiveness and request that you do not base your opinion of the Arbitrators on my conduct."

{n}Solomorne thumps himself on the chest and humbly says:{/n} "I ask your forgiveness and request that you do not base your opinion of the Arbitrators on my conduct."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne schlägt sich gegen die Brust und entgegnet demütig:{/n} "Ich bitte Euch um Vergebung und hoffe, dass Ihr die Arbitratoren nicht basierend auf meinem Verhalten beurteilt."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne thumps himself on the chest and humbly says:{/n} "I ask your forgiveness and request that you do not base your opinion of the Arbitrators on my conduct."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne schlägt sich gegen die Brust und entgegnet demütig:{/n} "Ich bitte Euch um Vergebung und hoffe, dass Ihr die Arbitratoren nicht basierend auf meinem Verhalten beurteilt."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne se frappe la poitrine et déclare humblement :{/n} « Je vous prie de me pardonner et vous demande de ne pas tirer de ma conduite des conclusions hâtives sur les Arbitrators. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne thumps himself on the chest and humbly says:{/n} "I ask your forgiveness and request that you do not base your opinion of the Arbitrators on my conduct."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne se frappe la poitrine et déclare humblement :{/n} « Je vous prie de me pardonner et vous demande de ne pas tirer de ma conduite des conclusions hâtives sur les Arbitrators. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne se da un golpe en el pecho y dice humildemente:{/n} «Le ruego que me perdone y le pido que no base su opinión de los Arbitrator en mi conducta».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne thumps himself on the chest and humbly says:{/n} "I ask your forgiveness and request that you do not base your opinion of the Arbitrators on my conduct."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne se da un golpe en el pecho y dice humildemente:{/n} «Le ruego que me perdone y le pido que no base su opinión de los Arbitrator en mi conducta».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙拍了拍胸膛，以谦逊的口吻开了口。{/n}“我请求大人你的原谅。希望你不要因为我的无礼，而对法务官产生负面印象。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne thumps himself on the chest and humbly says:{/n} "I ask your forgiveness and request that you do not base your opinion of the Arbitrators on my conduct."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙拍了拍胸膛，以谦逊的口吻开了口。{/n}“我请求大人你的原谅。希望你不要因为我的无礼，而对法务官产生负面印象。”

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは胸を軽く叩き、謙虚にこう言った。{/n}「どうか私の行動でアービトレイター全員を判断なさらぬよう、そして私の非礼をお許しくださるようお願いします」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne thumps himself on the chest and humbly says:{/n} "I ask your forgiveness and request that you do not base your opinion of the Arbitrators on my conduct."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは胸を軽く叩き、謙虚にこう言った。{/n}「どうか私の行動でアービトレイター全員を判断なさらぬよう、そして私の非礼をお許しくださるようお願いします」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, yumruğuyla gövdesine vurup mütevazılıkla cevap veriyor.{/n} "Affınıza sığınıyor ve size karşı olan yaklaşamımın, Yargıcılara dair görüşünüze etki etmemesini rica ediyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne thumps himself on the chest and humbly says:{/n} "I ask your forgiveness and request that you do not base your opinion of the Arbitrators on my conduct."
